body.p:
To His Excellency, the Hon Beriah Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky.

We the undersigned citizens of Bath, would respectfully, but earnestly solicit your excellency to remit a certain -- fine imposed, by a Judgement of the Bath Circuit Court at its MarchFebruary term, upon our esteemed young friend Mr Samuel Herndon, for retailing spirituous liquors -- believeing that such a remission of said fine by you meets the approbation of an overwhelming majority your people -- they knowing Mr Herndon well.

N. P. Reid.
John. G. Mason
J. A. Turner Jr
W, H, Brown
Jas. T. Young
W. P. Conner S. B. C.
M, R, Everett
J B Erwin
R. F. Binkley
O, S, Turner
Samuel Pike, of Montgomery.
